An Introduction to Computers in Information Science .A Artandi, S. This book is an introduction to the field of information science and technology, with particular emphasis on document organization. Its point of view is general in the sense that it attempts to deal with types of problems rather than particular systems.  When particular systems are described they are used as examples of systems rather than as models. The method of presentation is expository at the introductory level.  While differing points of view are frequently noted, this book is not intended to provide definitive critical evaluation.  Relevant research is reviewed in order to indicate current thinking and activities in the field. .X 5	1	553 90	1	553 124	1	553 127	1	553 129	1	553 190	1	553 191	1	553 197	1	553 211	1	553 214	1	553 218	1	553 243	1	553 289	1	553 294	1	553 307	1	553 330	1	553 333	1	553 378	1	553 449	1	553 450	1	553 451	1	553 452	1	553 459	1	553 468	1	553 484	1	553 492	1	553 508	1	553 511	1	553 512	1	553 514	1	553 518	1	553 520	1	553 523	1	553 524	1	553 525	1	553 526	1	553 529	1	553 530	2	553 534	1	553 535	1	553 546	1	553 553	6	553 579	1	553 594	1	553 598	1	553 603	1	553 604	1	553 606	1	553 609	1	553 610	1	553 611	1	553 612	2	553 617	1	553 620	1	553 625	1	553 626	1	553 628	1	553 630	1	553 636	1	553 637	1	553 642	1	553 648	1	553 650	1	553 692	1	553 696	1	553 699	1	553 703	1	553 705	1	553 708	1	553 726	1	553 727	1	553 728	1	553 731	1	553 732	1	553 733	1	553 734	1	553 736	1	553 738	1	553 739	1	553 740	1	553 741	1	553 742	1	553 743	1	553 744	1	553 755	1	553 802	1	553 819	1	553 820	1	553 826	1	553 827	1	553 874	1	553 877	1	553 878	1	553 879	1	553 883	1	553 940	1	553 941	1	553 963	1	553 990	1	553 992	1	553 993	1	553 995	1	553 1004	1	553 1035	1	553 1078	1	553 1079	1	553 1089	1	553 1091	1	553 1207	1	553 1216	1	553 1221	1	553 1229	1	553 1264	1	553 1297	1	553 1303	1	553 1356	1	553 1364	1	553 1368	1	553 1370	1	553 1372	1	553 1373	1	553 1374	1	553 1375	1	553 1376	1	553 1377	1	553 1421	1	553 1434	1	553 1435	1	553 1436	1	553 1436	1	553
